title: Finance Secretary: ‘Cash transfers not been done; short of that, there are lot of programmes’ - The Indian Express
content: Finance Secretary: ‘Cash transfers not been done; short of that, there are lot of programmes’  The Indian Express
description: In an interview with The Indian Express, Finance Secretary TV Somanathan said capital expenditure by states will have a quicker effect since it has a “greater geographical spread and a greater diversity of projects” compared to capex by the Centre.
